name: ArmA II: Army of the Czech Republic
name_original: ArmA II: Army of the Czech Republic
description:
ArmA II: Army of the Czech Republic is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Bohemia Interactive. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Bohemia Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
ArmA II: Army of the Czech Republic is available on PC.
